TopicTitle: Do near future mods (CKAN) work in 1.12

Articles.Content:
Hi, i really want to play with near future mods but cant since the 1.12 update. Ive tried playing on older versions but the mods still dont load. Can anyone help

If you ask i have both DLC installed and running while playing mods
